original_text:
For Israel has forgotten his Maker
    and built palaces,
and Judah has multiplied fortified cities;
    so I will send a fire upon his cities,
    and it shall devour her strongholds.
korean_text: 이스라엘은 자기를 지으신 이를 잊어버리고 왕궁들을 세웠으며 유다는 견고한 성읍을 많이 쌓았으나 내가 그 성읍들에 불을 보내어 그 성들을 삼키게 하리라

sentences.original_text: For Israel has forgotten his Maker
and Judah has multiplied fortified cities
so I will send a fire upon his cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 나는 그의 성읍들에 불을 보내리니

sentences.original_text: and it shall devour her strongholds
